MESSAGE.content: Info: VOF Rule: <rulename> has threat level <severity>

Info: MID <id> using engine: <agent> spam <result>

Info: MID <id> was generated for bounce of MID <id1>
Info: Message finished MID <id> done

Info: Connection Error: DCID <id1> domain: <domain> IP: <hostip> port: <network_port> details: <info> interface: <interface> reason: <result>
Info: Message done DCID <id1> MID <id> to RID [<id2>]

Info: DCID <id1> close
Info: Queue: Checkpoint { Started | Finished }

Info: MID <id> was too big (<bytes>/<fld24>) for scanning by <agent>

Info: ISQ: Quarantined MID <id>
Info: RPC Message done RCID <id1> MID <id>

Info: A System/Critical alert was sent to <to> with subject "<subject>".

Info: User <username> was authenticated successfully.
